name: Tijuana Tour with Paulino
location: Menealo NIGHT CLUB, Leona Vicario 1470, Zona Urbana Rio Tijuana, 22320 Tijuana, B.C., Mexico
description: Join us for an amazing tour in Tijuana, Puerto Nuevo, Rosarito on August 2nd. We'll meet and eat in Tijuana at 10:00 AM at 'Sabor a Mi' restaurant. After that, we'll head to Rosarito for some drinks and dancing. Around 4:00 PM we'll go to Puerto Nuevo for some lobster. Then we'll return to Tijuana to dance in the Menealo at 9:00 PM. If you are staying overnight, make sure to arrange a hotel with enough time. If you can't make it all day, you can join us at anytime. Be safe and let us know if you need help with transportation or hotel arrangements. Don't miss this fun day trip!
